text: @WhiteHouse @PressSec As if @realDonaldTrump WH would be able to produce and distribute to the entire country. @POTUS @VP can’t get TESTING (with results) and TRACING up and running #COVID19 losers #TrumpDeathToll138K #EndTheNightmare
